review: Doesn't work. Won't connect to Amazon.com. I spent 90 minutes on this, half that time on the phone with Amazon. They concluded it was a software issue and said they are going to send me a new one. When I asked for a free $3-4 movie fir all my time and trouble, the rep said because she was expediting delivery, there would be no free movie.Poor business acumen. It's not my fault this thing didn't work and they are acting like it's mine. Assuming I can get the new one to work we will see how many movies or other things I order from them. Smart business people should want to keep customers, not shove them away. And this is a good way to do it.
author: Carol Greenberg
